original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Friday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 1.09 percent or 94.64 points to 8,786.25, while the most liquid index S&PSL20 was up 1.31 percent or 32.34 points to 2,502.76.
Top gainers during mid day trade were Vallibel One, LOLC Finance and Browns Investment. (Colombo/June02/2023)
